Israeli tanks, missiles strike Gaza in offensive against HamasIsraeli forces attacked areas of the central and southern Gaza Strip where residents have been expecting a renewed ground offensive in areas crammed with tens of thousands of Palestinians already displaced by the Israeli-Hamas war. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 22:50:18 GMT Y564UT4TLVK7JLHZCOGXU6FLUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-tanks-missiles-strike-gaza-offective-against-hamas-2023-12-28/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud世界中东
Ukraine official says drone debris hits Odesa high-rise buildingA fire broke out at a multi-story building in the Black Sea port city of Odesa late on Thursday after drones were reported to be headed for the area, authorities said. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 22:15:58 GMT OOAK5KK6VZNLNJTQTDOLGWVR5A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-official-says-drone-debris-hits-odesa-high-rise-building-2023-12-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Former Hong Kong independence group leader seeks asylum in BritainThe former leader of a Hong Kong pro-independence group, who was sentenced under a national security law imposed by China, fled to Britain and will seek asylum over there, he told the Washington Post. Ukraine gives more details of latest alleged killing of POWsRussia has yet to comment on the allegation, the second accusation that it has killed prisoners of war leveled against it this month by Ukrainian prosecutors. Israeli troops killed hostages, mistaking their cries for help as ambush -militaryIsraeli troops killed three Israeli hostages in Gaza on Dec. 15 when it mistook their cries for help as a ruse by Hamas militants to draw them into an ambush, the military said on Thursday, concluding that the soldiers acted rightly to the best of their understanding. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 20:29:11 GMT CMDG5CIDEZLDBLT7WYVJRRHBWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-troops-killed-hostages-mistake-their-cries-help-ambush-military-2023-12-28/Emily Rose世界中东
Biden says American Judith Weinstein was killed by Hamas on Oct. 7American Judith Weinstein, who was believed to have been kidnapped by Hamas, was killed by the Palestinian Islamist group on Oct. 7 when it attacked Israel, President Joe Biden said on Thursday, adding he was devastated by the news. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 20:19:04 GMT BRIEPRFM35IQTBFCQS2CRWZBF4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/biden-says-american-judith-weinstein-was-killed-by-hamas-oct-7-2023-12-28/Andrea Shalal, Kanishka Singh世界中东
France, Germany, UK and US condemn Iran's increase in uranium enrichmentFrance, Germany, Britain and the United States on Thursday condemned an increase by Iran in the production rate of highly enriched uranium of up to 60% purity, close to the level used for nuclear weapons fuel. Venezuela's Maduro slams deployment of British warship to GuyanaVenezuelan President Nicolas Maduro on Thursday said the deployment of a British warship to waters off the coast of Guyana breaches the "spirit" of an agreement reached between Venezuelan and Guyanese authorities.
